item.title: Resume
item.description: Professional Experience Link to heading 01/2023 - Present | Python Backend Developer, COCUS AG, Düsseldorf TBD 09/2022 - 12/2022 | PhD Intern, Intel Corporation, Munich Research topic: Embedded Memory optimization via Machine Learning Development of an approach for uncertainty-aware memory optimization, comparing MC-Dropout, Bayesian Neural Networks, MIMO-Networks and Deep Ensembles. Design and deployment of a AutoML Service using Optuna and RabbitMQ for distributed optimization. Stack: Python, Kubernetes, Tensorflow, Docker, Django 03/2022 - 08/2022 | Python Backend Developer, COCUS AG, Düsseldorf
